Hello!

I’d like to use Prism with WPF Browser Application, which do Prism Library I need (WPF or Silverlight)?

Thank you!

Hi,

Take into account that Prism was not specifically built with this purpose in mind but there should be no problem creating an XBAP application. The target library to support this scenario would be WPF Prism Library, but we would recommend you to use Silverlight instead.

You might find useful this links where XBAP development is covered:

  • Can I develop XBAP application with this framework?
  • Can we create a WPF Browser based application
  • Prism with XBAP? 

I hope you find this information useful.

Thanks,

Miguel Bronzovic
